trans-unit.source: Provides the base functionality for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StaticPartialCachingControl"></xref> and <xref href="System.Web.UI.PartialCachingControl"></xref> classes.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.BasePartialCachingControl> class represents a user control that has output caching enabled in programmatic scenarios.
ASP.NET provides several ways to enable output caching for a control.
The following list describes methods you can use to enable output caching:
Use the `@ OutputCache` directive to enable output caching in declarative scenarios.
Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.PartialCachingAttribute> class to enable caching for a user control in a code-behind file.
Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy> class to specify cache settings in programmatic scenarios in which you are working with <xref:System.Web.UI.BasePartialCachingControl> instances.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.BasePartialCachingControl"></xref> class.
Gets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy"></xref> object that is associated with the wrapped user control.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.BasePartialCachingControl.CachePolicy%2A> property enables programmatic access to the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy> object associated with the user control contained by the <xref:System.Web.UI.BasePartialCachingControl> instance.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy> object can be programmatically manipulated to influence a user control's caching behavior and settings.
A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy"></xref> that stores output caching-related properties of the wrapped user control.
Gets or sets an instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency"></xref> class associated with the cached user control output.
This property allows you to remove user control output from the output cache when the associated cache dependency changes.
The <xref href="System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency"></xref> associated with the server control.
Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.BasePartialCachingControl"></xref> class.
Outputs the user control's content to the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> output stream.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> that writes the cached control to the page.
